name: Gravitatris
description:
Gravitatris may look like Tetris, but the winning strategies are nothing like the original. Experiment with the gravity and beat your high score time after time!

TIP: playing on two sides yields better outcomes

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D or arrows to flip the gravity
  • ESC to pause, resume, and restart on game over
  • W/S or arrows to cycle through the options
  • Enter or space to select an option
